mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(sum(n.LENGTH),1) len FROM t_emc_unit_net n, v_emc_unit v WHERE n.COM_ID = v.COMID AND v.ORGID in( SELECT id FROM t_emc_org WHERE FIND_IN_SET( id, emc_func_org_getchilds (#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )) and v.HEAT_TYPE=#{feetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ROUND(sum(n.LENGTH),1) len FROM t_emc_unit_line n, v_emc_unit v WHERE n.COM_ID = v.COMID AND v.ORGID in( SELECT id FROM t_emc_org WHERE FIND_IN_SET( id, emc_func_org_getchilds (#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )) and v.HEAT_TYPE=#{feetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
